name: Eldarya EVENT maps upgrade - 22.12.2015
description:
Regular map here
Halloween and Noel edition ヽ(•̀ω•́ )ゝ It's not with regular map because it's only seasonal.
Little tool that is adding to tooltips on map items that can be found at specific locations. Will be updated if i learn about something or new locations appear.
Thanks to all users who helped, shared informations or screens, you all were big help, because my little friend keep bringing me only masks (๑>ω<๑)
